itunes:title: Sept 1, 2022 - Emails Show Biden Admin and Social Media Giants Held Weekly Censorship Meetings
title: Sept 1, 2022 - Emails Show Biden Admin and Social Media Giants Held Weekly Censorship Meetings
description:
EXPOSED EMAILS between Facebook tech giants and the Biden administration show they held weekly censorship meetings on Covid-19; the 700-page report proves they intentionally censored negative side effects from the vaccine. Poso reviews several scientific journals and studies which confirm ‘gender-affirming’ hysterectomies have been and continue to be performed on American children and teenagers. Babylon Bee’s Seth Dillon offered a $20,000 reward in exchange for the identity of the Boston Children’s Hospital bomb threat caller, a caller who Dillon believes to be a leftist attempting to smear Libs of TikTok in retaliation for exposing the children’s hospitals role in child mutilation. Americans have begun taking out loans through ‘buy now, pay later’ apps to purchase groceries; companies like DoorDash, Costco, and even Starbucks have begun to accept these apps, but this is just making American debt and credit worse off due to missed payments. 


Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec 


Save up to 65% on MyPillow products by going to MyPillow.com/POSO and use code POSO


To get $150 off each 3-month supply of ‘My Patriot Supply’ when you go to PrepareWithPOSO.com, no promo code required
